name: Otobox.js
tagline: Simple and fast JavaScript/HTML5 library to create autocomplete inputs
body:
# otobox.js

> Simple and fast JavaScript/HTML5 library to create autocomplete inputs. Otobox has no external dependecies so all you need is to include the JS and CSS files, it's ready to go.
